channel.title: Dodian autospawn.cfg Help
channel.description: I edited some NPCS to different locations, and when I was done, I saved + compiled. Then ran my server again. But when I rejoined my server, they were still in the same spot.. How can I get them to correctly move? :S

item.title: Dodian autospawn.cfg Help
item.dc:creator: @xoskullxo13 xoskullxo13
item.description:
@xoskullxo13 wrote:

:S I know I did it right though… Because I’ve changed the location of the NPCs on different servers, I’m just having troubles with Dodian.

Read full topic

item.title: Dodian autospawn.cfg Help
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

You don’t need to compile when you’ve edited .cfg files. Also you may have more then one of that NPC located in the spot, or you didn’t change the coordinates correctly.

Read full topic
